brand_identity.name: SportsAdmin Pro
brand_identity.description: A high-precision administrative system that blends corporate reliability with athletic dynamism. Uses a strict Swiss grid system, high-contrast typography, and a 'Control Room' density for data.

usage_rules: HEADINGS (Chivo): Use for all page titles, card headers, and KPI values. Tracking tight (-0.02em).
BODY (Manrope): Use for all table data, form labels, and paragraphs. High legibility.
NUMBERS: Use tabular-nums for all data grids and financial figures.

rules: Sidebar: Fixed width (280px), dark navy background (#002d54), white text.
Header: Sticky, glassmorphism (bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md), 1px bottom border.
Cards: No shadow by default. Use 1px border (border-slate-200). Hover state: border-brand-blue/50.
Forms: Max-width 2xl for readability. Labels uppercase and small (text-xs font-bold text-slate-500).

buttons.primary: bg-[#002d54] hover:bg-[#001f3f] text-white rounded-sm font-medium px-6 py-2.5 uppercase tracking-wide text-xs transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 text-slate-900 rounded-sm font-medium px-6 py-2.5 uppercase tracking-wide text-xs transition-all
buttons.destructive: bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white rounded-sm font-medium px-6 py-2.5 uppercase tracking-wide text-xs

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-sm p-6 flex flex-col gap-4
cards.interactive: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-sm p-6 hover:border-brand-blue/50 transition-colors cursor-pointer

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-sm border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-[#002d54] focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

status_badges.success: bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700 border border-emerald-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase
status_badges.warning: bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 border border-amber-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase
status_badges.error: bg-red-100 text-red-700 border border-red-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase
status_badges.neutral: bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase

visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use solid colors and 1px borders for definition.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Minimal. shadow-sm only for dropdowns and modals. Dashboard cards should be flat with borders.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise texture on the sidebar background to give it a 'premium paper' feel.

images.description: Abstract blue ribbons, dynamic and professional. Use with a dark overlay (bg-navy/90) for the login screen.
Football coach on field. Use for 'Welcome' widget or profile placeholder.
Modern office meeting. Use for 'Contracts' or 'HR' section headers.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a thin, elegant look.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the brand colors (#002d54, #007AFF).
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'DashboardLayout' component first. Sidebar (Left, Fixed, Dark) + Main Content (Right, Scrollable, Light Grey Bg).
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove 'rounded-xl' and replace with 'rounded-sm'. Remove heavy shadows.
5. TABLES: This is a data-heavy app. Spend time on the Table component. Use 'tabular-nums', distinct headers (uppercase, small, bold), and zebra striping (even:bg-slate-50/50).
6. FORMS: Split long forms (Contract Creation) into Steps/Tabs. Do not dump 20 inputs on one page.
7. MICROSOFT: When referencing Outlook/OneDrive, use their official brand colors or a neutral 'Connect' button style.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) for testing.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§ ðŸ’­ðŸ’¡ðŸ”®ðŸŽ¯ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use sonner for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
